creator: xiaoming.lin@longshine.com
text:
Apache Jmeter 2.0.2
If I have two simple controller in test plan,
and I add a module ,set "module to run" to the second simple controler,
then I save the test plan.

after I open then test plan again,
I find that the "module to run" is set to the first simple controler.

Because I have a lot of module controller need be set to the second simple 
controller , I have to reset these module contrller again and again.

Now I copy the second simple controller anywhere when I need it.
But If someday I modify the second simple controller,
I have to copy it again.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 23248 ***
creator: xiaoming.lin@longshine.com
